金沙中國第三季業績好過預期，EBITDA 創近三年新高。

同時宣布，將投資 11 億美元，翻新擴建金沙城中心，打造成富倫敦色彩的綜合度假村，打造新的地標，包括興建「大笨鐘」，以及增加超過 600 間客房並將改名為「澳門倫敦人」。

“It’s easy to change coaches and people do it all the time … an easy answer is to do something. It’s harder not to do something. We have dealt with this a lot in different organisations and we just think that Arsène is doing a great job and he’s the right guy.

I’m sure he was thinking through if he wants to go on. We have a lot of respect for Arsène – we are not going to be pushy about things. I think he treated us with respect as well. I think he is more focused than ever. Focused on winning. I really think I do see that.”“

主席都迷雲,永續雲爺爺

“It’s easy to change coaches and people do it all the time … an easy answer is to do something. It’s harder not to do something. We have dealt with this a lot in different organisations and we just think that Arsène is doing a great job and he’s the right guy.

I’m sure he was thinking through if he wants to go on. We have a lot of respect for Arsène – we are not going to be pushy about things. I think he treated us with respect as well. I think he is more focused than ever. Focused on winning. I really think I do see that.”“
